channel.title: Tunnel Vision [Survival][PvP][Challenge]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/MIakiDr.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=3][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]Tunnel Vision[/size][/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Do you know how to survive while mining?[/font][/size][/center] [center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Only 1 heart left but you still slaughtered that creeper?[/font][/size][/center] [center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Looking for some challenge?[/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][b]Congratulations, you have just found the perfect server![/b][/font][/size][/center]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]This server is completely based on playing underground.[/font][/size] [size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][b]No[/b] easy-to-obtain items[/font][/size] [size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][b]No[/b] spawning trees[/font][/size] [size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][b]No[/b] animals[/font][/size]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Oh, too hardcore?[/font][/size][/center]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Fine, I'll give you a kit* with a 1h cooldown containing:[/font][/size] [size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]2 [/font][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]saplings[/font][/size] [size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]1 [/font][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]torch[/font][/size] [size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]1 [/font][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]apple[/font][/size] [size=2][size=1][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif](*To obtain this kit, type: /kit tunnel)[/font][/size][/size]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Oh my god. How do I join this server?[/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Simple, this is the IP:[/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=3][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][b]46.105.117.192:25569[/b][/font][/size][/center]

item.title: Tunnel Vision [Survival][PvP][Challenge]
item.dc:creator: @zuperfly zuperfly
item.description:
@zuperfly wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=3][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif][size=6]Tunnel Vision[/size][/font][/size][/center]

[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Do you know how to survive while mining?[/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Only 1 heart left but you still slaughtered that creeper?[/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Looking for some challenge?[/font][/size][/center]

[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Congratulations, you have just found the perfect server![/font][/size][/center]

[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]This server is completely based on playing underground.[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]No easy-to-obtain items[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]No spawning trees[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]No animals[/font][/size]

[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Oh, too hardcore?[/font][/size][/center]

[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Fine, Iâ€™ll give you a kit* with a 1h cooldown containing:[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]2 [/font][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]saplings[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]1 [/font][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]torch[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]1 [/font][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]apple[/font][/size]
[size=2][size=1][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif](*To obtain this kit, type: /kit tunnel)[/font][/size][/size]

[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Oh my god. How do I join this server?[/font][/size][/center]

[center][size=2][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]Simple, this is the IP:[/font][/size][/center]

[center][size=3][font=verdana, geneva, sans-serif]46.105.117.192:25569[/font][/size][/center]
